values.content: You are an expert content curator and summarizer. Your task is to analyze scraped content from Reddit posts, industry blogs, and Google trends to create a concise, engaging daily digest email. Focus on the most important and trending topics, provide clear summaries, and organize the content in a reader-friendly format.

Please analyze the following scraped content and create a comprehensive 'What's New Today' summary:

REDDIT POSTS:
{{ $json.reddit_content || 'No Reddit content available' }}

INDUSTRY BLOGS:
{{ $json.blog_content || 'No blog content available' }}

GOOGLE TRENDS:
{{ $json.trends_content || 'No trends content available' }}

Please organize this into:
1. Top Headlines (3-5 most important items)
2. Industry Insights (key developments from blogs)
3. What's Trending (popular topics from Reddit and Google)
4. Quick Bites (other notable mentions)

Keep each section concise but informative, suitable for a morning email digest.

workflow.name: Daily News Digest - What's New Today

values.content: You are a professional news curator. Create a concise, engaging daily digest from the provided content. Structure it with clear sections for Reddit highlights, industry news, and trending topics. Keep it informative but readable.
Please summarize today's content into a 'What's New Today' digest: {{ JSON.stringify($input.all()) }}

parameters.subject: What's New Today - {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

buildPhases.description: Initiates the daily workflow execution every morning at 8 AM using a scheduled trigger to start the content aggregation process.
Simultaneously scrapes content from multiple sources including Reddit top posts from 5 subreddits and RSS feeds from 3 industry blogs to gather raw content for processing.
Combines all scraped content from Reddit posts and blog articles into a single unified dataset for further processing and analysis.
Filters content quality using Google Perspective API to analyze toxicity and sentiment, ensuring only appropriate content proceeds to summarization.
Uses OpenAI to intelligently summarize and structure the filtered content into a professional, readable daily digest format with clear sections.
Sends the final AI-generated 'What's New Today' email digest to the recipient with the summarized content from all sources.

workflow.name: Daily News Digest - What's New Today

values.content: You are a professional news curator. Create a concise, engaging daily digest from the provided content. Structure it with clear sections for Reddit highlights, industry news, and trending topics. Keep it informative but readable.
Please summarize today's content into a 'What's New Today' digest: {{ JSON.stringify($input.all()) }}

parameters.subject: What's New Today - {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

phases.description: Initiates the daily workflow execution every morning at 8 AM using a scheduled trigger to start the content aggregation process.
Simultaneously scrapes content from multiple sources including Reddit top posts from 5 subreddits and RSS feeds from 3 industry blogs to gather raw content for processing.
Combines all scraped content from Reddit posts and blog articles into a single unified dataset for further processing and analysis.
Filters content quality using Google Perspective API to analyze toxicity and sentiment, ensuring only appropriate content proceeds to summarization.
Uses OpenAI to intelligently summarize and structure the filtered content into a professional, readable daily digest format with clear sections.
Sends the final AI-generated 'What's New Today' email digest to the recipient with the summarized content from all sources.

Keep each section concise but informative, suitable for a morning email digest.

parameters.content:
## 📥 Triggers
Initiates the daily workflow execution every morning at 8 AM using a scheduled trigger to start the content aggregation process.

## 📊 Inputs
Simultaneously scrapes content from multiple sources including Reddit top posts from 5 subreddits and RSS feeds from 3 industry blogs to gather raw content for processing.

## 🔄 Aggregation
Combines all scraped content from Reddit posts and blog articles into a single unified dataset for further processing and analysis.

## ⚙️ Transform
Filters content quality using Google Perspective API to analyze toxicity and sentiment, ensuring only appropriate content proceeds to summarization.

Uses OpenAI to intelligently summarize and structure the filtered content into a professional, readable daily digest format with clear sections.

## 🚀 Outputs
Sends the final AI-generated 'What's New Today' email digest to the recipient with the summarized content from all sources.

## 🚀 Grow your AI business
